summary: This is an email exchange from February 8, 2007, between two individuals discussing personal matters, including a fight with Jeffrey Epstein and plans to meet in New York. The email is part of the Epstein case document release and shows informal communication referencing Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned by the email sender as someone they had a fight with. The email discusses personal conflict with him.

events.title: Email exchange referencing fight with Epstein
events.description: An email exchange where the sender mentions having had a fight with Jeffrey Epstein and discusses travel plans to New York.

keyFacts: Email dated February 8, 2007, shows informal communication referencing Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender mentions having had a fight with Jeffrey Epstein.
The email discusses travel plans to New York and mentions Miami.
The document is part of the Epstein case file release (EFTA00143991.pdf).
